name: CUBENIGMA
description:
CUBENIGMA it's a multiplayer game where players will have to go forward together to solve the puzzles in different rooms and so go through the doors. Playable from 2 to 4 players.

+ Controls ----

+ Credits ----

Quick Outline by Chris Nolet

Music by Cafofo

Effect sound by Cafofo

Mirror Networking by vis2k

+ Details ----

To create the multiplayer game I used the networking API Mirror.

  • This game requires two players minimum.
  • If the level does not initialize correctly, restart the game !
